Reviews.Title: Looove this!!
Reviews.Author: Giselle M. Mateo "Amazon fan"
Reviews.Content: Great product!!!! the baby monitor is amazing! loove the app that allows me to see my baby from anywhere in the world. This camera add on works great!

Reviews.Title: There's gotta be something better out there
Reviews.Author: Christopher G.
Reviews.Content: Picture is okay.  Sound is not good.  The iPhone application is not very useful, and even with a fast connection the Lorex system does not functionally benefit us.  Maybe it's me...

ProductInfo.Features:
Crystal Clear Night Vision - reliable black-and-white video coverage monitors your child's every movement overnight.
Two-Way Talk... speak directly to your tot or toddler through the monitor's built-in high sensitivity microphone.
Built-In Nightlight... your little one will be comforted by a gentle glow if he or she wakes at any point during the night.
Up to 450 ft. of Wireless Range - audio and video feeds stay clear at long distances across your home and yard.
Expandable up to 4 Cameras - expand your CARE 'N' SHARE camera collection for a shared view of video feeds on one compact monitor.
ProductInfo.Name: Lorex BB311AC1B Baby Care N Share Add-on Accessory Baby Monitor Camera (White)
